content: How to avoid rebuilding a chunk of the project every time when using LSP and cargo run? I think what happens right now is that when I save the file LSP runs cargo check which invalidates the cache for cargo run and so when I run cargo run, cargo rebuilds half of the dependency tree.
Make sure you have the same RUSTFLAGS set for both. The they shouldn't invalidate each others cache.
I haven't set that envvar, :thinking:
Ah, I think I know why, I'll have openssl specific envvar set differently.
